description: Cockney rhyming slang, an ellipsis and clipping of Berkeley Hunt, a prominent hunt at Berkeley Castle in Gloucestershire, to mean cunt.

entries.meaning: (UK, Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, slang, derogatory, vulgar) Synonym of cunt in its various senses, (now especially somewhat endearing) a fool, a prat, a twit, etc. [1930]
examples: I don't know why they couldn't just keep it as it was! How hard is it to remember 911?You mean 999...I mean 999!That's the American one!Yeah!You berk.
